text: Borys Davidovich Deich (; 28 August 1938 – 7 February 2022) was a Romanian- born Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the Party of Regions. He was in the Verkhovna Rada from 2002 until 2014. Deich was born in Sighetu Marmației, Romania. He supported Russia's actions towards Crimea in Ukraine. Deich died on 7 February 2022 in Moscow, Russia from COVID-19, aged 83.Сегодня рано утром умер Борис Дейч ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow
title: Boris Deich
